channel.title: Diary of Ryan
channel.description: Recent content on Diary of Ryan

item.title: BadServer
item.description:
Situation

I established and finish testing on local, but when I prepare to upload and run it on github, many errors appear.

Action

I copied the error message and sent it to Gemini, he asked me to check the documents and setting. After I make sure everything went well, he asked me to check the status of github.

Result

I check it and found it broke. I would check the status of website first if everything went wrong.(lots of error message)

item.title: Website test
item.description:
First post in website

Math function test： $$f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty \hat f(\xi),e^{2\pi i \xi x} ,d\xi$$

Code funtion test：

print("Hello World")
